Comments_List: Negations in Middle Egyptian; second tense verb forms; conditional statements; interaction with ancient texts throughout the semester (the Shipwrecked Sailor, as well as excerpts for various assignments).

Grammar and literature of Middle Egyptian 
Transliterating and translating skills
